EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for trying Compliance Week (offer enclosed)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for setting up a 10-day trial with Compliance Week. I hope you found the content useful.

If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me.
Sincerely,
